primary_rule: IF NOT matched_by_any_of(museum,art_gallery,library,park,shopping_mall,cafe,bakery,restaurant,bar,hotel,church,castle,cemetery,market,bookstore,yarn_store,thrift_store) AND (google_types has landmark-like OR osm tourism=attraction/viewpoint OR wikidata p31 matches landmark/monument) THEN landmark ELSE fallback
merge_policy: openingHours/address/rating/photos: prefer google; tags/images: union; description: keep richer

primary_rule: IF (google_types contains museum) AND NOT (google_types contains art_gallery) THEN museum; OR osm tourism=museum; OR wikidata p31 contains museum
secondary_tag_rules: IF art_gallery also present THEN primary=art_gallery; tags+=alt_category:museum; tags+=google_type:*
merge_policy: prefer google for hours/ratings/photos; if google lacks cover and wikidata has P18 use wikidata cover

primary_rule: IF google_types contains art_gallery THEN art_gallery; ELSE IF osm tourism=gallery THEN art_gallery; ELSE IF wikidata p31 contains art museum/art gallery THEN art_gallery; ELSE IF google_types contains museum AND keywords match gallery THEN art_gallery
secondary_tag_rules: IF museum also present THEN tags+=alt_category:museum; tags+=google_type:*

primary_rule: IF google_types contains shopping_mall OR osm shop=mall THEN shopping_mall; ELSE IF google_types contains department_store AND not a single-brand store THEN shopping_mall
merge_policy: prefer google for hours/photos; union tags/images

primary_rule: IF google_types contains cafe/coffee_shop THEN cafe; ELSE IF osm amenity=cafe THEN cafe; ELSE IF fsq matches coffee/cafe THEN cafe; ELSE IF keywords match cafe AND NOT matched_by_any_of(bakery,restaurant,bar) THEN cafe
secondary_tag_rules: IF brunch signals present THEN tags+=meal:brunch; IF bakery also present THEN tags+=alt_category:bakery; tags+=google_type:*
merge_policy: openingHours: google first; if osm opening_hours exists store in custom_fields.osm_opening_hours_raw

primary_rule: IF google_types contains bakery THEN bakery; ELSE IF osm shop=bakery/pastry THEN bakery; ELSE IF fsq matches bakery THEN bakery; ELSE IF keywords match bakery/patisserie THEN bakery
secondary_tag_rules: IF cafe also present THEN tags+=alt_category:cafe; tags+=google_type:*

primary_rule: IF google_types contains restaurant THEN restaurant; ELSE IF osm amenity=restaurant THEN restaurant; ELSE IF fsq matches restaurant THEN restaurant; ELSE keywords match restaurant AND NOT matched_by_any_of(cafe,bakery,bar) THEN restaurant
secondary_tag_rules: IF brunch signals present THEN tags+=meal:brunch; tags+=google_type:*
merge_policy: openingHours: google first; rating: google or fsq; union images/tags

primary_rule: IF google_types contains bar/wine_bar/cocktail_bar OR osm amenity=bar/pub OR fsq matches bar THEN bar
secondary_tag_rules: tags+=google_type:*; if also restaurant/cafe then tags+=alt_category:restaurant/cafe

primary_rule: IF google_types contains hotel/lodging THEN hotel; ELSE IF osm tourism=hotel/guest_house/hostel THEN hotel; ELSE fsq matches hotel THEN hotel
secondary_tag_rules: IF hostel detected THEN tags+=lodging:hostel; tags+=google_type:*
merge_policy: prefer google phone/website/photos; hours often irrelevant

wikidata_props_hint: P84 建筑师;P149 风格;P18 图片
primary_rule: IF google_types contains church THEN church; ELSE IF osm building=church OR (amenity=place_of_worship + religion=christian) THEN church; ELSE IF wikidata p31 contains church THEN church
secondary_tag_rules: IF architecture signals exist (P84/P149/architect:wikidata) THEN tags+=domain:architecture; tags+=style:*; tags+=architect:*
merge_policy: hours: google if exists; cover from wikidata P18 if missing

primary_rule: IF google_types contains library OR osm amenity=library OR wikidata p31 contains library THEN library
secondary_tag_rules: IF architecture signals exist THEN tags+=domain:architecture; tags+=style:*; tags+=architect:*

primary_rule: IF google_types contains book_store OR osm shop=books OR fsq matches bookstore THEN bookstore
secondary_tag_rules: IF feminism keywords present THEN tags+=theme:feminism; store evidence in custom_fields.evidence_feminism

primary_rule: IF google_types contains cemetery OR osm landuse=cemetery OR amenity=grave_yard OR wikidata p31 contains cemetery THEN cemetery
secondary_tag_rules: IF landmark-like signals exist THEN tags+=alt_category:landmark; tags+=theme:memory (optional)
merge_policy: hours often none; keep google if exists; cover from wikidata if missing

primary_rule: IF google_types contains park OR osm leisure=park/garden OR wikidata p31 contains park/garden THEN park
merge_policy: hours: google if exists; else often always-open; union images/tags

primary_rule: IF osm historic=castle/palace/fort OR keywords match castle/palace/fortress OR wikidata p31 contains castle THEN castle
secondary_tag_rules: IF architecture signals exist THEN tags+=domain:architecture; tags+=style:*; tags+=architect:*; tags+=alt_category:landmark (optional)
merge_policy: hours: google if exists; cover from wikidata often good; union images/tags

primary_rule: IF google_types contains market/farmers_market OR osm amenity=marketplace OR fsq matches market THEN market
secondary_tag_rules: tags+=google_type:*; if also shopping_mall then alt_category:shopping_mall

primary_rule: IF NOT matched_by_any_of(shopping_mall,yarn_store,thrift_store,bookstore,bakery,cafe,restaurant,bar,market) AND (google_types contains store OR osm shop=* OR fsq retail) THEN shop
secondary_tag_rules: IF vintage signals exist THEN tags+=style:vintage; IF secondhand signals exist THEN tags+=shop:secondhand; store evidence tags+=evidence:*
merge_policy: openingHours/address: google first; else keep osm opening_hours raw; union images/tags

primary_rule: IF osm shop=wool OR craft=knitting OR keywords match yarn/wool/knitting/haberdashery THEN yarn_store; ELSE IF fsq matches yarn/knitting THEN yarn_store
secondary_tag_rules: IF only generic craft store then tags+=alt_category:shop; store evidence tags+=evidence:keyword:yarn
merge_policy: prefer google enrich for hours/photos if important; union images/tags

primary_rule: IF osm shop=second_hand OR keywords match thrift/second hand/resale OR fsq matches thrift THEN thrift_store
secondary_tag_rules: IF vintage keywords strong THEN tags+=style:vintage; store evidence tags+=evidence:keyword:vintage
merge_policy: prefer google enrich for hours/photos; union images/tags
